name: title

name: startRecordingDelays

description: Start the recording automatically after a delay (in seconds).

name: timeLimit
label: Time Limit
description: The maximum amount of time in each recording. The recording will stop when the time exceeds the limit.

fields.name: microphoneNotSupported
fields.label: Microphone not supported error message
fields.default: Microphone not supported. Make sure you are using a browser that allows microphone recording.

fields.name: microphoneInaccessible
fields.label: Microphone inaccessible error message
fields.default: Microphone is not accessible. Make sure that the browser microphone is enabled.

fields.name: insecureNotAllowed
fields.label: Message displayed when insecure access is not allowed
fields.description: Some browsers do not allow using the microphone when the page is served using HTTP. This message will be displayed if that is the case
fields.default: Access to microphone is not allowed in your browser since this page is not served using HTTPS. Please contact the author, and ask him to make this available using HTTPS
